cursed_technique.name: Limitless
cursed_technique.description: A technique passed down in the Gojo family that brings the concept of 'infinity' into reality, allowing him to manipulate space at an atomic level.

signature_moves.name: Cursed Technique Lapse: Blue
signature_moves.effect: Amplifies the concept of negative numbers and distance, creating a magnetic effect of attraction.

signature_moves.name: Cursed Technique Reversal: Red
signature_moves.effect: Generates a powerful repulsive force by flowing positive energy into the Limitless technique.

signature_moves.name: Hollow Technique: Purple
signature_moves.effect: Combines Blue (attraction) and Red (repulsion) to create an imaginary mass that erases everything in its path.

domain_expansion.name: Unlimited Void
domain_expansion.effect: Floods the target's mind with an infinite amount of information, rendering them catatonic and unable to act.
